title: Spamming laugh or taunt in game should be a re portable offense or a limited function. Pls read.
body:
It's just really aggravating and kind of mean spirited when the enemy team just spams laugh command over and over along with ranked emotes.
I'm doing pretty well this season made plat and am planning to continue to diamond.
I don't think I should have to choose between turning the volume off to avoid that irritation and knowing sound effects of abilities in the fog of war.

Some of us just really want to play the game without the over the top egos being shoved in our face. Especially when it isn't always because of us..
Smash bros for instance in its online competitive limits the function in a round to avoid a bad atmosphere being created.

Yes I know it's 1v1 and the 2 games are very different but it really does go a long way to produce a good atmosphere.
I don't want to see the same emote spammed endlessly. It's frustrating and really makes me want to play the game less.
It would be a huge quality of life improvement I think for many summoners to be able to disable these particular audio and visual effects.
I feel there are times when everyone just really wants to focus at their best, their absolute best and I really believe this would help me perform and keep my anger in check if i had the ability to disable this function.

If someone at riot could at least consider it and if more then a few people could up-vote this it would be greatly appreciated.

Hey just a follow up on the post here; My main point is that we should have optimal settings. If someone is spamming lux laugh literally all game non stop I shouldn't have to put up with it and neither should anyone else. 
I shouldn't have to compromise the quality of the important sound effects in league while quite possibly my teammate or enemy just does it for self indulgent pleasure of aggravating the person around them.

I personally feel after thinking about it that it should be integrated into client options so at least the summoner has the power to filter out that aggravating noise.
You can keep your obnoxious laugh/taunt but I shouldn't have to hear it or see it as it is not a critical or even necessary device.
